text: Pranahita Pushkaralu is a festival of River Pranahita normally occurs once in 12 years. The Pushkaram is observed for a period of 12 days from the time of entry of Jupiter into Pisces (Meena rasi). ==See also== *Godavari Pushkaralu *Pushkaram ==References== Category:Festivals in Telangana Category:Water and Hinduism Category:Hindu festivals Category:Religious tourism in India Category:Hindu pilgrimages
title: Pranahita Pushkaralu
